name: CubeLit
description:
You are C257 the newest robot in the gravity robot testing branch at Grav.inc

CubeLit is a platforming game with only one button.   You only need to press the spacebar to play.  It's a game where you will run forever,  and you can flip your characters gravity at the press of the space bar.  This game is about 10-15 minutes long.  

This is my entry into the GMTK Game Jam 2019.  With the theme being "Only One"

If you enjoyed the game feel free to come check out my website http://www.7thtime.com. I will be posting more information of my journey into game development as while as my process in creating CubeLit.
